OpenAIChat_API_KEY_LABEL_description: You can create a new API key via https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
OpenAIChat_CHAT_MODEL_LABEL_description: The Open AI chat model to use. The default value is "gpt-3.5-turbo".
OpenAIChat_ORG_LABEL_description: An optional field to specify the organization id that this chat pertains to.
OpenAIChat_MAX_TOKENS_LABEL_description: The maximum number of tokens per request from the OpenAI chat model. 100 tokens ~= 75 words. You can visit this link for more info about tokens: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936856-what-are-tokens-and-how-to-count-them
OpenAIChat_HELP_description: Customizable message used for fetching documentation and/or help pages using command `/chatgpt-help`.
OpenAIChat_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_INSTRUCTION_LA: System Instruction (how the ChatGPT should behave)
